作.definition: to do; to engage in; to write; to compose; to pretend; to feign; to regard as; to consider to be; to be; to act the part of; to feel (itchy, nauseous etc); writings; works

作下.definition: to do; to make (usually bad connotation)

作主.definition: to decide; to have the final say

作亂.definition: to rebel; to rise in revolt

作人.definition: to conduct oneself; same as 做人

作伴.definition: to accompany; to keep sb company

作保.definition: to act as surety for sb; to be sb's guarantor; to stand bail for sb

作假.definition: to counterfeit; to falsify; to cheat; to defraud; fraudulent; to behave affectedly

作出.definition: to put out; to come up with; to make (a choice, decision, proposal, response, comment etc); to issue (a permit, statement, explanation, apology, reassurance to the public etc); to draw (conclusion); to deliver (speech, judgment); to devise (explanation); to extract

作別.definition: to take one's leave; to bid farewell

作勢.definition: to adopt an attitude; to strike a posture

作合.definition: to make a match; to get married

作嘔.definition: to feel sick; to feel nauseous; to feel disgusted

作壽.definition: variant of 做壽|做寿[zuo4 shou4]

作好準備.definition: to prepare; to make adequate preparation

作威作福.definition: tyrannical abuse (idiom); riding roughshod over people

作客.definition: to live somewhere as a visitor; to stay with sb as a guest; to sojourn

作對.definition: to set oneself against; to oppose; to make a pair

作廢.definition: to become invalid; to cancel; to delete; to nullify

作弄.definition: to tease; to play tricks on

作弊.definition: to practice fraud; to cheat; to engage in corrupt practices

作怪.definition: (of a ghost) to make strange things happen; to act up; to act behind the scenes; to make mischief; odd; to misbehave (euphemism for having sex)

作態.definition: to put on an attitude; to pose

作揖.definition: to bow with hands held in front

作文.definition: to write an essay; composition (student essay); CL:篇[pian1]

作料.definition: condiments; seasoning; coll. pr. [zuo2 liao5]; Taiwan pr. [zuo2 liao4]

作東.definition: to host (a dinner); to treat; to pick up the check

作梗.definition: to hinder; to obstruct; to create difficulties

作業.definition: school assignment; homework; work; task; operation; CL:個|个[ge4]; to operate

作業員.definition: operator (of a machine etc); factory worker

作法.definition: course of action; method of doing sth; practice; modus operandi

作準.definition: to be valid; to count; authentic

作為.definition: one's conduct; deed; activity; accomplishment; achievement; to act as; as (in the capacity of); qua; to view as; to look upon (sth as); to take sth to be

作用.definition: to act on; to affect; action; function; activity; impact; result; effect; purpose; intent; (suffix) -ation, -tion etc, as in 抑制作用[yi4 zhi4 zuo4 yong4], inhibition

作祟.definition: haunted; to haunt; to cause mischief

作秀.definition: to show off (loanword, from English "show"); to grandstand; to perform in a stage show

作繭自縛.definition: to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising; hoist by his own petard

作興.definition: maybe; possibly; there is reason to believe

作色.definition: to show signs of anger; to flush with annoyance

作證.definition: to bear witness; to testify; to serve as evidence

作踐.definition: to ill-use; to humiliate; to degrade; to ruin; also pr. [zuo2 jian4]

作陪.definition: to attend (a banquet etc) to keep a chief guest company

作風正派.definition: to be honest and upright; to have moral integrity

作鳥獸散.definition: lit. scatter like birds and beasts (idiom); fig. to head off in various directions; to flee helter-skelter
